suggest.amasty/module-elastic-search-graphql: Install module-elastic-search-graphql module to activate Graphql and Elastic Search
suggest.amasty/module-meta-tags-to-elastic-searc: Install meta-tags-to-elastic-search module to activate Amasty Meta Tags and Elastic Search compatibility
suggest.amasty/module-elastic-search-mftf-2: Install elastic-search-mftf-2 module to be able to run ElasticSearch MFTF tests for Magento 2.3.5+ version
suggest.amasty/module-elastic-search-mftf-3: Install elastic-search-mftf-3 module to be able to run ElasticSearch MFTF tests for Magento 2.4.0+ version
suggest.amasty/module-elasticsearch-catalog-perm: Install module-elasticsearch-catalog-permissions if you want elastic to work properly with Adobe Commerce Shared Catalogs
